title: Saying Alhamdulillah for major & minor things, is it shirk if we don't say Allah's Name Assimalhakee
transcript: saying alhamdulillah when talking about mega projects and small things so alhamdulillah i managed to fix the light bulb or alhamdulillah i managed to secure my target for the next quarter of 2020. mega things small things any problem no problem and there is no actual shirk major shirk but there is minor shirk if you are not mentioning allah's name so that you would not have your heart and other people's hearts diverted from allah the creator and the facilitator of everything to your own power and your own knowledge
